Producer: Flávio R. Tambellini, Hector Babenco, Óscar Kramer, Rui Pires
Screenwriter: Hector Babenco, Victor Navas, Fernando Bonassi, Drauzio Varella
Production Co: Lereby, Oscar Kramer S.A., Br Petrobas, HB Filmes, Columbia TriStar Filmes do Brasil, Globo Filmes
Synopsis: A doctor (Luiz Carlos Vasconcelos) listens to inmates' stories as he tests them for HIV in a dangerously overcrowded Brazilian prison.
Title: Carandiru
